document.full_text: under pressure from a new round of defections, libyan leader muammar gaddafi renewed a ceasefire call in talks with an african mediator but gave no sign he will heed western-led demands that he step down.
document.title: officers disown gaddafi as peace bid stalls
lines_and_colors: under pressure from a new round of defections, libyan leader muammar gaddafi renewed a ceasefire call in talks with an african mediator but gave no sign he will heed western-led demands that he step down.
